title: Putin Repeats Unsupported ‘Dirty Bomb’ Claim, Fueling Fears of Escalation
description: The Russian leader said, without offering evidence, that Ukraine was planning to detonate a bomb designed to spread radioactive material. Washington warned that Moscow could be trying to create a pretext for its own attack.
dc:creator: The New York Times
media:credit: Ivor Prickett for The New York Times
media:description: A woman cycled past a destroyed house on Tuesday after receiving humanitarian aid in the village of Khreshchenivka, which was liberated from Russian forces in early October.
